page.name: Network & Infrastructure
page.page_description: Welcome to the Network and Infrastructure status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Network & Infrastructure OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Network & Infrastructure's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [LIM1][Network] - vRack incident notification
incidents.message: We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Network (vRack) offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the Rack LIM0311B06A. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 25/06/2025 10:06 UTC Customers Impact : The vRack services is temporarily unvailable. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue. Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.  We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [GRA2][Network] -  vRack Private Network incident notification
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that the incident on our vRack Private Network offer has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 23/06/2025 18:25 UTC End time : 23/06/2025 18:45 UTC Impacted Service(s) : vRack private network was temporarily unavailable for some servers in GRA2. Customers Impact : Some customers were temporarily unable to access and use their servers through vRack. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [GLOBAL][Network] - vRack incident notification
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that the incident on vRack offer has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 19/05/2025 09:57 UTC End time : 23/05/2025 14:02 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Configuration of vRack network was temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Since 23/05/2025 12:30 UTC, customers are able to configure their vRack without a problem. Impacted customers between 19/05/2025 09:57 UTC and 23/05/2025 12:30 UTC are able to configure their vRack network (add/remove servers from vRack) since 23/05/2025 14:02 UTC. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
